Data: Hello and welcome to the first of two Twenty20s between Australia and West Indies. The hosts have won the toss and will bat.
Deonarine to Watson, 1 run bowls it full outside off, almost yorker length, digs it out into the leg side for a single
Deonarine to Warner, no run short of a good length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
Deonarine to Warner, no run shortish on leg stump, turned away towards midwicket, dot ball
Deonarine to Warner, no run plays it forcefully towards extra cover
Deonarine to Warner, no run short of a good length on leg stump, punched towards midwicket
Deonarine to Warner, no run excellent start by Deonarine, pushed it full and quick outside off, chips it towards extra cover, lands on the bounce
Miller to Watson, no run angling it towards leg stump, Watson tries to push it past midwicket, is struck on the pads but it would have been sliding down
Miller to Watson, no run cracked straight to point
Miller to Watson, no run slog-sweep, an attempted slog-sweep, tries to smash it over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto the pads, the frustration builds
Miller to Watson, 1 run sliding on the pads, clipped wide of short fine for a single
Miller to Warner, FOUR runs Warner gets hold of one, slightly overpitched, made room and lofted it over extra cover for a couple of bounces over the ropes
Miller to Warner, no run bowls it on a good length on the off, punched towards mid-off
Sammy to Watson, no run short of a good length outside off, chops it towards point
Sammy to Watson, 1 run shortish on the off, drags it in ugly fashion past the bowler into the deep towards long-on for a single
Sammy to Warner, no run short of a good length on the off, a tight line, punched just wide of mid-off, no run on offer there
Sammy to Warner, FOUR runs slower one bowled on a good length outside off, takes the aerial route, clears cover and point for a one bounce four
Sammy to Warner, no run lands it on a length on the off, driven straight towards mid-off
Sammy to Warner, FOUR runs edged and four, good length and he makes room to crash that through the covers, gets a thick edge past the keeper to the third-man boundary
Deonarine to Watson, 1 run bowls it full on middle, driven hard back to the bowler who fumbles to allow them a single
Deonarine to Warner, FOUR runs gives him the charge, takes it off a length and lofts him cleanly over mid-off for a boundary, back on track after that quietish start

Deonarine to Warner, SIX runs that's disappeared, out of the ground and into the street, pitched up, in the slot for Warner, took a couple of steps forward and launched it handsomely over deep midwicket
Deonarine to Warner, no run pitched it up on leg stump, driven hard but straight to mid-on
Deonarine to Warner, FOUR runs full toss on middle, came down the track and swatted it over the bowler's head for another boundary, beat the diving fielder in the deep
Deonarine to Warner, 1 run pushed off the front foot wide of mid-off for a single to keep the strike
Sammy to Warner, no run bowls it on a length on middle, driven with a full face towards mid-off
Sammy to Warner, 1 run lucky, slower one bowled short on middle, the offcutter, tries to smack him over midwicket, gets the top edge but it lands safely in front of mid-on
Sammy to Watson, 1 run pushed down the ground towards mid-on for a single
Sammy to Warner, 1 run low full toss on leg stump, driven down the ground towards long-on for one more

Sammy to Watson, SIX runs Watson gets into the act now, this is a strong start, bowled on a length and he is onto it quickly, picks it up beautifully, dispatching it into the stands over deep midwicket for a massive six
Sammy to Watson, FOUR runs four more, pushed it full and he sliced it into that gap between point and short third man for another boundary
Roach to Warner, no run short on middle, goes for the pull, misses, good bounce and good pace

Roach to Warner, SIX runs what a comeback from Warner, it was six the moment he hit it, sweet sound of bat murdering the ball, short of a length and he pulls it with utter disdain over deep square leg into the stands
Roach to Warner, 1 run slower one bowled short outside off, chops it in front of the keeper for a single
Roach to Watson, 1 run short of a length outside off, guided to third man for a single
Roach to Warner, FOUR runs four more, short of a length outside off, makes room, slashes hard and gets it over short third man for another boundary
Roach to Warner, 2 runs didn't pick the short offcutter there, made room and tried to clear the in-field on the off side, just about managed to do it, a couple more to the score
Smith to Watson, 1 run shortish outside off, drags it towards deep square leg for a single
Smith to Warner, 1 run bowled it full on the off, driven through the line to long-off for a single
Smith to Watson, SIX runs into the crowd again, feeding hi with length deliveries here, clips it off his pads over deep square leg, the crowd couldn't have asked for more
Smith to Watson, 1 run short, pulls it hard towards deep square leg, fielded well in the deep, just a single
Smith to Warner, 1 run cracked towards long-off for a single

Smith to Watson, SIX runs had made up his mind there had Watson, the ever so generous Smith gifts him with another length delivery, on middle and leg, and Watson gets under it to dismiss it over wide long-on, terrible bowling
Gayle to Warner, 1 run fullish on the off, played towards deep extra cover for a single
Gayle to Watson, 1 run bowls it on a length on middle and leg, swipes it on the bounce to deep midwicket for a single
Gayle to Warner, 1 run full toss on the off stump, makes room and slaps it towards deep extra cover for one more
Gayle to Watson, SIX runs another six, in the slot on middle and leg, makes a bit of room and swings it over deep midwicket for a flat six

Gayle to Watson, OUT gets him, finally! Gave it some air this time, tossed up on middle, tried to dispatch it into the stands over deep midwicket, got the top edge and Ramdin, after waiting ages for it to come down, clasped it easily
Gayle to Warner, 1 run pushed wide of point for a single
Smith to Warner, no run short of a good length on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
Smith to Warner, 2 runs slower one bowled full on leg stump, driven in the direction of wide long-on for a couple of runs
Smith to Warner, OUT full toss on middle, he could have smacked it anywhere but instead played it back straight to the bowler who accepted it gleefully
Smith to Hussey, 1 run played down towards third man for a single, thinks of a second but the fielder acts on it quickly
Smith to Clarke, FOUR runs nicely done, took a couple of steps forward, walked across and worked it off his hips wide of short fine for a boundary
Smith to Clarke, 1 run driven down the ground towards long-on for a single
Gayle to Clarke, 2 runs sliding it on middle, paddles it down towards fine leg for a couple of runs
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track and taps it down towards long-on for a single
Gayle to Hussey, no run quicker through the air, plays it back to the bowler
Gayle to Hussey, OUT three down, cleanly struck but hit flat, came down the track and smacked it hard but straight to Roach at long-off who did well moving to his right and holding on to a sharp one
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run swept down towards fine leg for a single
Gayle to White, 1 run flighted outside off, driven towards long-on for a single
Pollard to White, 2 runs short of a length outside off, punched towards deep extra cover for a couple
Pollard to White, no run short of a length, cracked it towards mid-off
Pollard to White, 1 run shortish on the off, slapped it towards mid-off and raced through for a single, had there been a direct hit, White was a gonner
Pollard to Clarke, 1 run short of a length outside off, guided wide of short third, who fumbles to allow them a single
Pollard to White, no run short of a good length outside off, guided it straight to short third
Pollard to White, 1 run short of a good length outside off, chopped it towards short third for a single
Miller to White, no run gets outside the line to sweep, is struck on the back pad
Miller to White, 1 run goes for the sweep again, gets the top edge but it ends up falling short, deep square leg could have done more there, should have charged forward to catch that
Miller to Clarke, 1 run punched towards long-off for a single
Miller to White, 1 run driven hard towards long-off for a single
Miller to Clarke, 1 run short of a length on the off, cracked towards deep point for a single
Miller to White, no run pitched it up on middle, driven towards midwicket
Pollard to Clarke, OUT four down, Miller takes a sharp one at point, short and wide, cut away hard and he hurls himself to his right to snap an excellent catch
Pollard to Birt, 1 wide too short, ducks under it, too high and is given a wide
Pollard to Birt, no run leaves it alone like in a Test, short of a good length outside off, shoulders arms to the keeper
Pollard to Birt, no run gets outside the line and defends it back to the bowler
Pollard to Birt, no run slower one bowled full on middle, driven hard back to the bowler
Pollard to Birt, 1 run short and wide, makes room and cracks it to deep cover for a single, big cheers from his home crowd
Pollard to White, 1 run shortish on the off, punched towards long-on for a single
Miller to White, 2 runs makes room and drives it wide of long-off for a couple of runs
Miller to White, no run bends low to play the sweep, gets an inside edge onto his pads
Miller to White, 1 run short of a length on the off, slapped it to long-off for one more
Miller to Birt, 1 run gets outside the line and drives it down the ground to long-on for a single
Miller to White, 1 run fires it towards middle and leg, driven to long-off for one more
Miller to Birt, 2 runs worked away through square leg, some excellent running fetches them the second
Pollard to White, no run short of a length outside off, tries to force it off the back foot wide of extra cover, gets an inside edge on the bounce to the keeper
Pollard to White, 1 run short, makes room and cracks it wide of long-off for one more

Pollard to Birt, FOUR runs bowling from well behind the stumps, Sammy in the deep makes a mess of it, length ball outside off, lofts it wide of long-off and Sammy, moving to his right, fails to hold on and allows it to go for a boundary, dropped, poor effort
Pollard to Birt, FOUR runs excellent shot, pitched it up this time and he smashed it hard through long-off and extra cover for a convincing boundary
Pollard to Birt, 1 run short of a good length on middle, closes the face to drop it into the leg side for a single
Pollard to White, 1 run shortish on the off, punched through extra cover for a single
Miller to White, 1 run full toss on the off, slapped towards deep midwicket for a single
Miller to Birt, OUT stumped, Miller bowled it flat outside off, Birt came down the track and tried to push it on the off side, missed and Ramnarine did the rest
Miller to Haddin, 1 run flighted on middle, driven through the line to long-on for a single

Miller to White, OUT smashed, ummm not quite, it's actually caught by Pollard running to his right from long-on, flighted on middle and leg, White got under it and tried to launch him over deep midwicket, hit it extremely high, didn't get the desired distance and
Miller to Haddin, 1 run full on middle, played towards mid-on for a single
Miller to Johnson, 1 run flat, shortish outside off, defended into the leg side and he sneaks in a quick single
Pollard to Johnson, 1 run short of a length on middle, dropped into the leg side for a single
Pollard to Haddin, 1 run slower one bowled short outside off, guided wide of point for a single
Pollard to Johnson, no run short of a good length outside off and cuts away, leaves it alone to the keeper
Pollard to Johnson, 1 run edged, cut away, he played it down with soft hands, landed short of the diving keeper who fumbled to allow them a single
Pollard to Haddin, 1 run tapped it into the off side to steal a single
Pollard to Johnson, no run bowls it on a good length outside off, tried to swing it over midwicket, couldn't get his bat to it
Roach to Haddin, 2 runs short of a good length outside off, slapped it wide of short cover, sneaks a single and they get another one in overthrows
Roach to Haddin, 3 runs pitched it up on middle, smacked it over the bowler's head, looked like a certain boundary but for Pollard, who dived full length to his left to keep them down to three
Roach to Johnson, 1 run short of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single
Roach to Haddin, (no ball) full and wide, tries to reach for it but misses, he's overstepped though and conceded a freehit
Roach to Haddin, 2 runs gets only a couple, full toss outside off, makes room and chips it over extra cover for a couple
Roach to Haddin, 1 wide wide, full toss, slipped out of his hand there, another extra ball and run
Roach to Haddin, FOUR runs smashed this time and Pollard has no chance, full toss and he drills it back down the ground to beat long-off and long-on to the ropes
Roach to Haddin, 2 runs beautifully struck but equally well fielded, short and wide, cuts it hard wide of point and Morton dived to his left to pull it back in
Sammy to Johnson, OUT ...and gets a wicket, short outside off, Johnson tries to slap it over the off-side field, doesn't get hold of it, Sammy runs back to hold on to a well-judged catch
Sammy to Haddin, 2 runs full outside off, driven through to long-off for a couple
Sammy to Haddin, 1 run played down towards long-on for a single
Sammy to Smith, 1 run all along the ground towards long-on for a single
Sammy to Haddin, FOUR runs nicely timed, full toss outside off, makes room and drives it elegantly to beat deep cover to the ropes, raced off the bat
Sammy to Haddin, SIX runs a terrible delivery, short, this time on middle, and he gives it the appropriate treatment, sending it into the stands over deep midwicket
Smith to Smith, 1 run full outside off, steered to point for a single
Smith to Haddin, SIX runs Haddin continues to punish, picked it off a length and swung it over wide long-on for another six
Smith to Haddin, 1 run played into the off side for a single
Smith to Smith, 2 runs short on middle, goes for the pull, gets a top edge but it lands safely behind mid-on, a couple more to the score

Smith to Smith, FOUR runs what drama, Wavell Hinds lost it in the lights, short on middle and he went for the hook, got a top edge and Hinds, waiting at fine leg, had no clue where it went, by the time he finally saw it, it had gone past the ropes, four more
Smith to Smith, OUT caught-behind, off the reverse paddle, full outside off, tries to play it towards third man, gets a faint touch and Ramdin makes no mistake
179 is a challenging score, though it sets the perfect stage for Gayle to display his skills. Join us in a little under ten minutes. We are in for more entertainment
The players have made their way out. Nannes has the ball.
Nannes to Gayle, 1 run short on the off, pulled wide of mid-on for a single, West Indies are away
Nannes to Simmons, FOUR runs short and wide, cut away hard through point for a boundary, encouraging start for Simmons, Phil's nephew
Nannes to Simmons, 1 run sliding it on the pads, worked away through square leg for a single
Nannes to Gayle, 1 leg bye a single to fine leg, was struck hard on the legs there as he tried to whip it square
Nannes to Simmons, no run swinging in, trying to drive it past midwicket, is struck on the pads, stifled appeal from the bowler but that was sliding down

Nannes to Simmons, no run appeal for lbw, looked close, bowled it full on middle and leg and Simmons tried to defend it from the crease, was struck on the pads and in line but he may have got an inside edge
Tait to Gayle, FOUR runs a Gayle special that, short on the off and he whips in a manner only he can with his foot up to the square-leg boundary
Tait to Gayle, no run great stuff, bowled at 154 kmph outside off, full and Gayle is tempted into playing the drive, misses
Tait to Gayle, 1 wide short outside leg stump, tries to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, misses, gets a wide
Tait to Pollard, no run sees it off, short of a good length, moves across and defends it back to the bowler
Tait to Pollard, 2 runs bowls it on a good length outside off, drives it wide of mid-on for a couple to get off the mark
Nannes to Simmons, no run short and wide, makes room to cut, slashes hard, misses

Nannes to Simmons, OUT another one goes, Tait again in action, bowls it on a good length on middle and off and Simmons has a mindless, needless swipe at it, ends up miscuing it to third man where Tait takes a well-judged catch
Nannes to Pollard, no run struck hard but straight to the fielder, bowls it on a length on the off, driven straight to mid-on
Nannes to Pollard, FOUR runs short of a length on middle, gets into position early and pulls it away through square leg for a boundary
Nannes to Pollard, 1 run almost had him there, rose up to him much more than he expected, was late on the pull, got a top edge but landed safe in front of fine leg
Nannes to Hinds, no run short of a good length on middle, worked away wide of midwicket
Tait to Pollard, no run short of a length outside off, moved away and he let it go
Tait to Pollard, 1 run swinging in, bowls it on a length, tries to crash it past midwicket, hits the inside half of the bat, gets a single towards fine leg
Tait to Hinds, no run short of a length on middle, defended with a full face back to the bowler
Tait to Hinds, 1 run bowls it full on the off, tries to crack it past extra cover, gets an inside edge on the pads, sneaks a quick single
Tait to Pollard, FOUR runs excellent shot, pulls it away hard, short on the off, seized the length early, rocked back and pulled it past square leg for a boundary
Tait to Pollard, 1 wide bowls it short outside leg stump, tries to work it fine, misses, a run conceded
Nannes to Hinds, 1 run pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket for a single
Nannes to Morton, no run short of a length outside off, tries to force it past point, misses and it slides through to the keeper
Nannes to Morton, no run bowls it full on the off, played straight to point from the crease
Nannes to Morton, no run short of a length on the off, tries to punch it past midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his pads
Nannes to Morton, 1 wide too high a bouncer, that. Working up some good pace, almost hitting 150, but it's given a wide
Nannes to Morton, 1 run short of a good length on middle, worked away past midwicket for a single
Nannes to Hinds, no run short of a good length on middle and leg, defended to mid-on
Johnson to Morton, FOUR runs short on middle, right length for Morton who pulls it away through square leg, flashes of encouragement here but so far, they've proven unsustainable
Johnson to Morton, 1 run short of a good length on the off, punched towards mid-off for a single
Johnson to Hinds, no run short of a good length, defended towards point
Johnson to Hinds, FOUR runs full length outside off, slower one, picks it up early, launching it over mid-off for a boundary
Johnson to Hinds, 1 run pushed back down the pitch for a single towards mid-on
Johnson to Morton, 1 run short of a good length on the off, punched wide of mid-off for a single
Hussey to Morton, 1 run flat on the off, closes the face and turns it towards deep midwicket for a single
Hussey to Hinds, no run shortish on the off, defended wide of point for a single
Hussey to Hinds, 1 run
Hussey to Morton, no run hurls it full on the off, digs it out back to the bowler
Hussey to Morton, 1 run pushed down the ground to long-off
Hussey to Hinds, 1 run flighted outside off, cracked through to deep cover for one more
Johnson to Hinds, 2 runs smashed back past the bowler but Steven Smith at long-off does well, moving to his left, sliding and dragging it back in
Johnson to Hinds, no run short of a good length, defended towards point from the crease
Johnson to Morton, no run full and wide, tries to drive it hard past the bowler, misses
Johnson to Morton, no run bowls it on a length outside off, slapped straight to mid-off
Johnson to Morton, no run slower one bowled short outside off, doesn't pick that, is too early into the pull, misses
Smith to Smith, 1 run short of a length on the off, punched past extra cover for a single
Smith to Morton, 1 run flighted on middle, swept down towards fine leg for a single
Smith to Smith, no run tossed up outside off, tries to swing it over midwicket, misses as it turns away
Smith to Smith, 1 run short outside off, slapped towards long-off for a single
Smith to Morton, 1 run
Smith to Smith, 1 run pushed wide of midwicket for another single
Johnson to Smith, 1 run played towards mid-off for a quick single
Johnson to Morton, 1 run short of a length on middle, mistimes a pull wide of midwicket

Johnson to Smith, OUT That's No.6, Steve Smith times his jump to perfection after running from deep square leg, short and it's pulled hard, runs a few yards to his left, leaps and snaps that comfortably to send West Indies down into further trouble
Johnson to Morton, 1 run bowls it on a length outside off, drives it uppishly towards deep cover for a single
Johnson to Ramdin, no run short of a good length on the off, punched towards point
Johnson to Ramdin, 1 run full and wide, steered towards third man for a single
Smith to Ramdin, 1 run fullish on middle and leg, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
Smith to Morton, no run short of a length outside leg, tries to push it past midwicket, is struck on the pads
Smith to Morton, no run flighted on middle, played back to the bowler
Smith to Morton, 2 runs turned away through midwicket for one more
Smith to Morton, 1 run played down the ground towards long-on

Smith to Ramdin, FOUR runs nicely done, short of a length outside off, turns away sharply, cuts it hard past point, Warner, at deep point, runs to his left and dives full length in an attempt to haul it back but fails, valiant effort nevertheless
Clarke to Morton, 1 run short of a length, slapped past extra cover into the deep for a single, well fielded by Birth who is cheered on by his home crowd
Clarke to Ramdin, 3 runs slashed away hard wide of deep point, Birt is in action again, diving to his left and keeping them down to three
Clarke to Morton, 1 run played in the direction of midwicket for a single
Clarke to Ramdin, no run short of a length on the off, cuts it towards point
Clarke to Ramdin, 1 run pushed wide of midwicket for a single
Clarke to Morton, 1 leg bye fires it hard on leg stump, bends low to sweep, misses, is rapped on the pads but that would have gone down
Smith to Morton, 1 run short of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single
Smith to Ramdin, 2 runs Warner into the act, dives to his right to save that caressed drive from getting to the ropes, just two to the score
Smith to Ramdin, 1 run flighted on middle, swung hard towards deep square leg for a couple
Smith to Morton, FOUR runs bends low and slog-sweeps it between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a boundary
Smith to Morton, 1 run
Smith to Ramdin, 1 run short of a good length outside off, slapped towards deep cover for one more
Tait to Ramdin, no run attempted yorker, dug out into the leg side as he tries to play it past midwicket
Tait to Ramdin, no run aiming for the yorker again, drags it to midwicket
Tait to Ramdin, FOUR runs some fight here by Ramdin, short of a length outside off, cut away hard over point for a boundary
Tait to Ramdin, 1 run bowled it short outside off, guided down to third man for a single
Tait to Morton, 1 run full on middle, drilled down towards long-on for one more
Tait to Ramdin, no run short of a length outside off, makes room to slash that past point, misses
Clarke to Morton, 3 runs short of a good length outside off, tickles it past point for three runs
Clarke to Ramdin, FOUR runs Clarke tosses it up, it lands full outside off, Ramdin makes room and creams that over extra cover for a boundary
Clarke to Ramdin, FOUR runs short on middle, rocks back and pulls it hard through square leg for a boundary, struck hard and gets the reward
Clarke to Ramdin, 1 run bowls it short outside off, slapped towards deep cover for a single
Clarke to Morton, no run
Clarke to Morton, 1 run swung away hard but straight to deep midwicket for a single
Johnson to Morton, 1 run short of a length on middle, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
Johnson to Ramdin, FOUR runs fiercely hit, short, makes room and slashes it hard past point, leaving no chance to the fielder in the deep despite his valiant dive
Johnson to Ramdin, 1 run bowls it on a length, cracked towards deep point for a single
Johnson to Morton, no run short of a length on middle, makes room to pull that past midwicket, misses
Johnson to Morton, FOUR runs bowls it full on middle, in the slot for Morton who gets under it and dispatches it between long-on and deep midwicket
Johnson to Morton, 1 run bowls it full outside off, cracks it hard towards long-on for a single
Watson to Morton, 1 run slower one bowled on a length outside off, cracked down towards long-on for a single
Watson to Ramdin, 1 run slower one bowled full outside off, slammed towards long-off for one more
Watson to Morton, 1 run short of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single
Watson to Ramdin, FOUR runs spirited effort by these two, short on middle, pulled away over short fine leg for a boundary
Watson to Ramdin, 1 run short of a length outside off, cracked towards deep cover for a single
Watson to Morton, 1 run bowls it on a length on the off, slapped towards long-off for a single
Nannes to Morton, 1 run bowls it on a length on middle, driven wide of midwicket for a single
Nannes to Ramdin, FOUR runs Ramdin's showing some spunk at the death, bowled it full on middle, made room and slogged it over midwicket for a one bounce four
Nannes to Ramdin, 1 run slower one bowled full outside off, makes room to crack it over extra cover, gets a thick edge to third man for a single
Nannes to Morton, 1 run short of a length on the off, swats it just wide of extra cover for a single

Nannes to Morton, OUT Steve Smith takes another beauty! Even better than the first one, bowled it on a good length on the off, Morton swung it hard and connected well but Smith was there waiting, it appeared as though it would clear him but he timed his jump perf
Tait to Miller, 1 run low full toss on middle, driven wide of mid-on for a single, he did well to dive and keep them down to just one
Tait to Sammy, 1 wide short of a length outside leg stump, given a wide
Tait to Sammy, 1 run yorker, dug out into the leg side, did well to get his bat down in time
Tait to Miller, no run short and wide, makes room to cut, misses
Tait to Miller, FOUR runs shot! Full outside off, makes room and square-drives it through point for a boundary
Tait to Miller, 2 runs short of a length on middle, went for the pull, gets the top edge and gets it towards fine leg for a couple
Tait to Miller, 1 run gets an inside edge towards fine leg for a single
Watson to Miller, 1 run short of a length on the off, tries to slap that over the in-field, gets a top edge but it lands safely in front of mid-off
Watson to Sammy, no run short on middle, goes for the pull, misses
Watson to Sammy, 1 run short of a good length on middle, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
Watson to Miller, 1 run shortish on leg stump, tickled into the leg side for a single
Watson to Sammy, 1 run short of a good length on middle, worked away through square leg for a single
Watson to Miller, 1 run short of a good length on the off, slapped past the bowler for a single
That's all, folks. Thanks for tuning in. See you in a couple of days. Adios
A few comments from our readers before signing off.

Australia have won this comfortably, though had West Indies prevented that horrendous start to their chase, we would have had a more competitive match. Nevertheless, the crowd would have been entertained, especially in the Australian innings. Join us for the second T20
Australia won by 38 runs
Player of the match is Shaun Tait, AUS
